name: lights off - global Dark style
description: Will put EVERY Website on Black / Grey Theme
additional_info:
Additional Errors may be occur. Its a total simple script. 
You may not see some Grafics or Videos on your favorite site. (But it works on most sites, so give it a try) 
Style enables GLOBAL (but not on about:blank) so take care you shut it off if you don't want to use it. 

For me its a morning, everyday use.
